content: **a note about yarns from the designer ** this pattern will work well with any hand-dyed yarn that has a subtle color scheme that s either semisolid or only discretely contrasting yarns that have been dyed a more dramatic combination of colors may obscure the stitch motif i used sundara yarns somewhat solid sock yarn hand-dyed superwash two-ply merino wool **size information ** because the ribbed stitch pattern is stretchy and flexible the socks can be made larger or smaller by going up or down a needle size and increasing or decreasing the length from back of heel to beginning of toe decreases
